textbox: A crown appears above your head and while at exactly 1 full red heart of health, you gain a +1.5 Range Up, +2.0 Tears Up and +0.20 Shot Speed Up
textbox 2: Any time your health changes to be not exactly 1 red heart you lose the effect
textbox 3: This item does nothing with The Lost
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Dark Prince's Crown now grants more of an increase in rate of fire, and the bonus now breaks the soft tears cap.
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium as Azazel
textbox 6: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room

textbox: Gives you a 6.66% chance to fire a razor blade which deals x4 damage
textbox 2: +0.3 Tears Up
textbox 3: This item also turns your tears red, but does not change your actual damage stat or the damage your normal tears do
textbox 4: The chance to fire a razor blade depends on your luck stat, and at +14 luck you will fire a razor blade every time

textbox: With every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a cluster of 12 tears instead of your normal tear
textbox 2: Causes your normal tears to fire out of one eye, which means tears will fire in a near-perfect line instead of slightly off-center
textbox 3: REPENTANCE - Lead Pencil's tear barrage no longer deals double damage
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: +0.3 Damage Up
textbox 2: +0.1 Speed Up
textbox 3: When entering a room connected to a Secret Room or Super Secret Room, a howling sound will play
textbox 4: When entering a room with a crawl space trapdoor in it, a barking sound will play

textbox: While firing, you gain a green aura that poisons any enemies which touch it. The poison deals your tear damage per tick, for 2 ticks
textbox 2: Has no effect on Lilith, as she cannot fire tears

textbox: While firing tears constantly for 7.5 seconds, you spawn a poop cloud, which deals periodic damage to any enemies which come near it
textbox 2: The cloud deals damage equal to your base tear damage per tick, roughly 5 times per second
textbox 3: Clouds last 15 seconds before disappearing
textbox 4: The cloud can be pushed slightly by firing tears at it

textbox: Upon taking damage, Isaac starts to bleed, leaving a trail of blood and spraying blood tears everywhere which deal damage to nearby enemies
textbox 2: While bleeding, Isaac takes damage every 30 seconds
textbox 3: The blood sprays in the direction you are current firing, or just randomly near Isaac if not shooting your tears
textbox 4: The blood spray scales with your current tear damage and any future damage increases
textbox 7: This effect lasts until you pick up a red heart

textbox: +1 Soul Heart
textbox 2: Enemy bullets have a 25% chance to be deflected back at the enemy, which will hurt them and apply the concussive status effect, causing it to be stunned for a few seconds

textbox: Every 20th tear fired will also fire a golden coin tear at the same time. This tear turns enemies to gold for a few seconds and causes them to drop 1-4 coins if killed while golden (similar to the Midas' Touch item)
textbox 2: When the Midas Touch tear effect triggers, it will remove 1 coin from your current total
textbox 3: The golden tear deals double your tear damage
textbox 4: The effect can still trigger even if you have no held coins
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Keeper

textbox: Drops a random card on pickup
textbox 2: Doubles the effect of most tarot cards. A slow pulsing outline HUD effect appears for cards that would be buffed by Tarot Cloth
textbox 3: To see the full list of Tarot Card effects, check out the Mechanics > Tarot Cloth page
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 astrology items needed in the same run to unlock Planetariums

textbox: Every time you take damage, 10 high damage tears are fired in a circle around you (similar to the Tammy's Head effect)
textbox 2: Tear damage is equal to Isaac's tear damage + 25 flat damage
textbox 3: Additionally, has a chance to activate the Anemic effect when taking damage for 2 seconds
textbox 4: Similar to Tammy's Head, this item synergizes with a lot of items (i.e. with Brimstone it fires 10 lasers)

textbox: Turns your tears into bones, which shatter into 1-3 smaller bone shards upon hitting any object or enemy
textbox 2: The smaller bone shards deal damage equal to half your normal tear damage
textbox 3: +0.38 Range Up
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lazarus

textbox: Allows Isaac to carry two cards, runes or pills (or any combination of these) at the same time
textbox 2: Drops a random card, pill or rune on pickup

textbox: +0.38 Range Up
textbox 2: Drops a lucky penny
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier Mode with The Lost
textbox 6: Item Pool: Boss Room, Beggar, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: +1 HP Up
textbox 2: REPENTANCE - This was renamed from Moldy Bread
textbox 6: Item Pool: Boss Room, Beggar, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: +1 Soul Heart
textbox 2: Each time you take damage from any source, Cone Head has a 20% chance to prevent it from reducing your health
textbox 3: Isaac flashes blue very briefly when damage is negated by this item

textbox: Drops one random trinket on pickup
textbox 2: Gives you an extra trinket slot

textbox: Isaac's tears have a 20% chance to be a booger instead, which stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die
textbox 2: Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
textbox 3: Each booger persists for 10 seconds or until the enemy dies

textbox: Adds a chance to shoot a concussive tear, which will cause enemies to walk around dazed in confusion
textbox 2: The daze effect is effectively permanent for normal enemies, and has a much longer duration for bosses compared to other status effects
textbox 3: Makes all rooms slightly darker
textbox 4: The visual effect of a Glaucoma tear is hard to notice, however it is slightly lighter than normal tears and is not a perfect circle shape

textbox: This item gives you a chance that instead of firing tears you will fire an egg sack, which slows enemies on hit and drops a pool of white slowing creep below them
textbox 2: If a parasitoid shot successfully hits an enemy, a blue friendly fly or spider is spawned
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.

textbox: Causes your tears to become piercing, allowing them to travel through enemies
textbox 2: After hitting its first enemy, each tear will double in damage and gain a homing effect
textbox 3: +0.38 Range Up
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Judas

textbox: +0.3 Damage Up
textbox 2: Each tear has a chance to become acidic, allowing it to break rocks, pots and other breakable objects
textbox 3: Acidic tears can also be used to open secret rooms

textbox: +2 Soul Hearts
textbox 2: This item will modify drops from room clearing and champion enemies based on your current player state. The priority list of what will drop from champion enemies in order is as follows:
textbox 3: Soul Hearts - When you have no red heart containers and less than 2 soul hearts
textbox 4: Red Hearts (Full hearts) - While at 0.5 red hearts
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier mode with Maggy
textbox 7: Keys - When you have no keys
textbox 12: Bombs - When you have less than 5 bombs

textbox: +0.35 Tears Up
textbox 2: Allows you to fire tears diagonally by holding down two of the fire buttons at once
textbox 3: If you are using a gamepad, this item allows you to fire in any direction

textbox: The first enemy you kill in each new room will now explode and poison all nearby enemies, causing them to take periodic damage until they also die and explode
textbox 2: If you have lots of enemies near each other this can cause a chain reaction, killing lots of enemies in one go

textbox: Gives Isaac a finger which floats infront of him and points in the same direction he is facing or firing. The finger deals 10% of your normal damage to all enemies in the same direction that the finger is pointing
textbox 2: The finger will also deal damage to entities such as fires and poops
textbox 3: Applies on-hit status effects such as the burning debuff from Fire Mind
textbox 4: Spawns guppy flies if you have the Guppy transformation

textbox: Isaac gains a shadow familiar that will follow Isaac's movement pattern  by a 0.66 second delay and deal 5 contact damage to enemies per tick
textbox 2: Shade is absorbed by Isaac after dealing over 666 damage. This spawns friendly charger enemies and causes Isaac to deal 5 contact damage (same as the shade did). This effect stacks with multiple shades, scaling the contact damage each time
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Judas
textbox 6: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room

textbox: Isaac gains a cloud familiar that follows him and leaves a trail of tears on the floor which damages enemies for 2 damage per tick
textbox 2: Enemies touching the cloud have a chance to activate the Crack the Sky effect, which spawns a light beam that deals damage equal to your tear damage + 20

textbox: Gives Isaac a small Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room dealing 2 contact damage per tick
textbox 2: While you're firing tears Hushy will stop moving, which allows you to keep it in one place
textbox 3: Hushy will block enemy tears and projectiles
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Hush with Apollyon

textbox: Gives Isaac a small Monstro familar, who's tears can be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack
textbox 2: Lil Monstro's tears each deal base damage (3.5) and do not scale with damage upgrades

textbox: A baby familiar that follows you and causes other familiars to follow it. It stops moving while Isaac is firing tears and upon releasing the fire button, King Baby will teleport back to your location
textbox 2: King Baby will always appear first in the queue of familiars
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Familiars now automatically aim at enemies when being commanded by King Baby
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium on The Void floor with ???

textbox: A familiar that follows Isaac and charges forwards very slowly, dealing 2.7 damage per tick to any enemies it comes into contact with
textbox 2: Almost identical to the Little Chubby familiar, but this one moves much more slowly and deals less damage
textbox 3: REPENTANCE - The damage tick rate on Big Chubby has been increased

textbox: Upon use, this item deals 9,999,999 damage to all enemies in the room and then kills you 3 seconds later
textbox 2: This is a single use active item, meaning it is destroyed after using it
textbox 3: Does not kill both phases of multi-phase bosses like Hush or Ultra Greed
textbox 4: If used to kill a boss, the kill still counts as a victory for post-it note completion marks, but the run will still get a game over
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lazarus
textbox 7: Delirium's death animation takes longer than 3 seconds, meaning you will die before it can count as a completion mark. One exception to this is if you are playing as Lazarus or have Lazarus' Rags - you will respawn in the same room and get the kill
textbox 12: Item Pool: Shop, Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Demon Beggar

textbox: When used, the D1 duplicates 1 random pickup in the current room. This works with all normal pickups, including cards, runes, chests and trinkets. Duplicated items might not be identical copies of the original - for example duplicating a card may spawn a different card
textbox 2: Jera runes and trinkets cannot be duplicated using the D1
textbox 3: Duplicated chests can turn into another kind of chest randomly (e.g. Red chests)
textbox 4: Can be used in a shop to duplicate pickups which have not yet been purchased, and take the duplicate pickup for free
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Isaac

textbox: When used, Void will consume any pedestal items in the current room
textbox 2: If an active item is consumed, its effect will be added to Void's effect when used, allowing you to consume multiple items and combine their effects
textbox 3: If a passive item is consumed, you gain a small stat upgrade to a random stat
textbox 4: Possible stat changes include: +1.0 flat damage, +0.5 tears, +0.2 speed, +0.2 shot speed, +0.5 range, +1.0 luck
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium in The Void floor with Apollyon
textbox 7: Void does not work on devil deal or shop items unless they have been bought first
textbox 12: Item Pool: Devil Room, Angel Room

textbox: Upon use, this item freezes all enemies in the room until you press the fire button again or 30 seconds passes (whichever happens first)
textbox 2: Unlike other active items, bosses are not immune to this effect
textbox 3: Touching a frozen enemy will still hurt you
textbox 4: This item doesn not affect troll bombs - they will still explode

textbox: Upon use, the Smelter will destroy your currently held trinket and give you the effect permanently, allowing you to stack up lots of different trinket effects
textbox 2: Holding the Smelter increases the chance for a trinket to drop. (2% chance for the end of room drop to become a trinket)
textbox 3: If a trinket has been smelted, it won't appear a second time unless the entire trinket pool is exhausted or you restart the run (e.g. by doing a victory lap)
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart on Hard Mode with Apollyon

textbox: When used, Compost doubles up the current number of blue flies and spiders you have
textbox 2: When picked up, Compost will also destroy every consumable on the ground in the current room and turn each of them into a blue fly or blue spider
textbox 3: If you have no pickups on the ground in the current room and no other flies or spiders, Compost will spawn 1 blue fly or blue spider

textbox: When used, this item will distort all the sprites and music, rotating graphics 90 degrees and translating them diagonally up/left, while leaving the hitbox in the same place. This can make it confusing while navigating the room
textbox 2: Enemy hitboxes remain the same
textbox 3: Dataminer will randomly increase or decrease one of your stats by a small amount when used
textbox 4: Gives you the Fruit Cake effect for the room when used, which will give a random tear effect with every tear fired
textbox 7: All visual and tear effects reset after leaving the room

textbox: When used, this item will randomly change you into another character and remove the last item you picked up
textbox 2: All stat changes of the new character are applied (e.g. character damage multipliers)
textbox 3: This item can only reduce your heart containers and will not increase them if you change back into a character with more health. This means if you roll into The Lost, changing back to another character will leave you with only 1/2 of a soul heart
textbox 4: Cannot turn you into a character that isn't unlocked yet
textbox 7: Also includes Lazarus II (Lazarus' revived form) and Dark Judas (effect of Judas' Shadow)

textbox: A one time use item that when used will explode all objects (i.e. rocks, poop) in the room and deal 200 damage to all enemies in the current room, as well as every other room for the remainder of the floor
textbox 2: Also opens the boss rush door after Mom's Foot, blue womb door after Mom's Heart, secret rooms and super secret rooms
textbox 3: Like all single-use items, this item cannot be absorbed and used multiple times by the Void item
textbox 4: Entering a room with an angel statue will destroy it and automatically spawn one of the Angel mini bosses
textbox 7: REPENTANCE - This now blows up machines, beggars and fireplaces too

pickup: "I can't believe it's not butter bean!"
textbox: Upon use, this item will fart, pushing enemies away and causing a wave of rocks to spawn that spread outwards from Isaac in a circle, dealing 10 damage per hit to any enemies caught in it
textbox 2: Can be used to open secret rooms
textbox 3: Visually this item is very similar to Butter Bean
textbox 4: The rock waves can destroy destructible objects, e.g. poop

textbox: When used, you have a 50% chance to double all items, consumables and chests in the current room
textbox 2: If the effect fails, all pickups and items are deleted and Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin
textbox 3: If there are no consumables currently on the floor, Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin
textbox 4: This item works with items which can be purchased such as shop items, allowing you to spawn a free version if the effect triggers
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Keeper
textbox 7: If used in a shop and the effect fails, a Restock box can be used to restore the shop items. This mechanic is very useful on Greed and Greedier modes
textbox 12: Item Pool: Item Room, Shop, Beggar

textbox: Upon use this item hurts Isaac without actually taking health away, allowing you to activate any items which trigger when taking damage without losing health
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium on The Void floor with Eve

textbox: When used, this item permanently removes one of your red heart containers and gives you a flat +0.2 Damage Up, the Anemic effect (+1.5 Range Up + red creep trail) and a Cube of Meat
textbox 2: The Anemic effect will only last for the current room, but the Cube of Meat and Damage Up are both permanent
textbox 3: Only works for red hearts and has no effect when used if you only have soul/black hearts
textbox 4: Has no recharge time and can be used as often as you like
textbox 7: It is possible to generate multiple meatboys by stacking more than 4 Cubes of Meat

textbox: When used, this item gives you the effect of a random item for the rest of the room
textbox 2: Using this item multiple times in the same room will replace the previous item's effect with a new one
textbox 3: Certain items can be activated with this item which have unexpected effects and many items will do nothing
textbox 4: Items do not grant consumable drops which would normally occur when that item is picked up
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Eden
textbox 7: Most flight-granting items have cosmetic effects only, and will not allow you to fly

textbox: This dice allows you to press the Drop key to cycle between all possible dice effects and pick one to use
textbox 2: Charge time scales based on the chosen dice, updating every time you use it
textbox 3: Possible dice include: D1, D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, D100
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - This item was completely reworked for Repentance and no longer forces a random dice use each time. You can pick which dice you want to use.
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Isaac

textbox: A one time use active item that when used, will spawn 2 random item pedestals from the item pool associated with the current room (e.g. in an Angel room, this will spawn 2 Angel room items)
textbox 2: Starts with 0 charge and requires 12 charges to use
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Eden

textbox: Every 6-7 rooms Acid Baby will drop a random pill
textbox 2: The first pill drops after 2 rooms
textbox 3: Every time you use a pill, Acid Baby will deal 10 damage to all enemies and poison them for 6-7 ticks
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 7: REPENTANCE - Poison effect is stronger, but Acid Baby's pill drop rate has been reduced to every 6-7 rooms (previously every 2-3 rooms)

textbox: +1 Luck Up
textbox 2: A familiar fairy that will float around the room and highlight the location of any secret room doors, tinted rocks or trapdoors under rocks
textbox 3: Upon entering a new room, if there is an undiscovered secret room or tinted rock, it will move directly to the point of interest, otherwise it will just randomly fly around the room
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar

textbox: For every empty red heart container, Isaac gains Damage Up and his body increases in size
textbox 2: Only works on full hearts - damage does not change if Isaac is missing 1/2 of a heart in one container
textbox 3: Healing empty red heart containers will remove the damage increases
textbox 4: Has no effect for The Lost and ???, as they cannot gain red heart containers (except for counting towards the Spun transformation)
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Demon Beggar
textbox 7: Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation

textbox: Isaac gains electric tears, which fire 1-2 sparks of electricty in random directions upon hitting any object or enemy
textbox 2: The electricity will chain between nearby enemies
textbox 3: The electricty deals half of your normal tear damage
textbox 4: Tear effects will still apply to your electricty sparks in a lot of cases. Spoon Bender will give them a homing effect, and status effects like fear/poison will spread onto all enemies the electricity chains to
textbox 7: Tears which fall naturally to the floor at max range do not generate sparks

textbox: Each tear now has a small chance to be a spectral blue flame instead, which deals damage to enemies that come in contact with it
textbox 2: The fire will remain in place and shrink in size when deals damage to something. After dealing enough damage it will eventually disappear
textbox 3: At full size the flame deals 6x your tear damage, scaling down to 3x at its smallest size
textbox 4: The chance to for each tear to become a flame is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate 50% of the time (starts at 8.33% at +0 Luck)

textbox: Each tear now has a small chance (3.33%) to be a needle instead, which deals 3 times your tear damage
textbox 2: If a needle hits a non-boss enemy it will instantly kill it and will explode into a circle of 10 more needles
textbox 3: The 10 spawned needles will also deal 3 times your tear damage, but won't instantly kill enemies or explode into more needles
textbox 4: The chance to for each tear to become a needle is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate 50% of the time
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lilith
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
textbox 7: Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation

textbox: Upon entering a new room, Isaac will become camouflaged and enemies won't attack until you start firing tears
textbox 2: Bosses are immune to this effect
textbox 3: Camo Undies grants +0.5 speed while cloaked
textbox 4: When uncloaking, all nearby enemies take damage, and Isaac gains a brief tears + damage up

textbox: Any time a devil or angel room door opens after a boss, the other one will also spawn
textbox 2: The extra door will only spawn if a devil or angel room was randomly chosen to spawn already
textbox 3: After entering one of the doors, the other will disappear
textbox 4: If there isn't an available wall for the extra door to spawn on, only one door will spawn (i.e. in a small boss room)
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lilith
textbox 6: Item Pool: Devil Room, Angel Room

textbox: Gives you a 100% chance to find an Angel Room on every valid floor after defeating the boss
textbox 2: Doesn't spawn an angel room on any floor where it is normally not possible to find one (e.g. Basement 1, Cathedral, Sheol etc.)
textbox 3: Keeps the chance at 100% even after entering and leaving the angel room, meaning the door will not close after visiting
textbox 4: Makes it impossible to find Devil Rooms again, unless you find a way to remove or reroll this item away, or find the Duality item
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Maggy

textbox: A sack familiar that drops a sack every 5 or 6 rooms cleared (alternates between 5 and 6)
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode as Cain

textbox: Gives you an extra heart container for every 25 coins you are currently holding, up to a maximum of 4 extra HP at 99 coins held
textbox 2: If your coin counter goes below the required amount for a heart container, you will lose it again
textbox 3: This item works for the Keeper, allowing him to exceed his usual 2 health containers
textbox 4: However, if Keeper drops to under 2 health coins as a result of Greed's Gullet, he is unable to use a HP Up to increase his health back to 2, and has to regain the lost coins to do so
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #35 (Pong)

textbox: Gives you a random chance while firing tears to also fire a creep shot, which deals double your tear damage and places white creep on the floor infront of you that slows enemies down if they walk through it
textbox 2: Unlike some similar tear effects, your luck stat does not alter the chance for this effect to activate
textbox 3: A creep shot is also fired in a random direction after taking damage

textbox: While firing tears you have a 5% chance to fire a void tear. Void tears that touch enemies will spawn Big Horn, who appears and grabs them, instantly killing that enemy
textbox 2: The chance to for each tear to become a void tear is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate 20% of the time
textbox 3: Isaac also grows a horn on his head, which causes you to deal contact damage to enemies by running into them (this effect deals base damage of 3.5 per tick)
textbox 4: Void tears from this item can also destroy blue/purple fires, spiked blocks and stone grimaces
textbox 6: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar

textbox: When used, will spawn a fly turret that doesn't move and fires tears at nearby enemies
textbox 2: Only persists for the current room
textbox 3: The fly's bullets deal 3.5 damage each and do not scale with your own damage stat
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Brown Nugget flies now have faster shot speed, and their damage has been increased to 3.5 (from 2).
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Ultra Greed as Apollyon

textbox: At the start of each new hostile room, you have a 20% chance to gain a random charmed familiar which will fight for you
textbox 2: The charmed enemy has its own health bar and will die if it takes enough damage
textbox 3: Charmed enemies persist between each room and floor for as long as they stay alive
textbox 4: Allows you to have more than one charmed familiar at a time if you can keep them alive

textbox: Every time one of your tears hits an enemy, it has a chance to start bleeding, which will cause it to take damage every 5 seconds
textbox 2: The bleed damage dealt by BackStabber is based on how quickly an enemy is moving (faster enemies take more damage)
textbox 3: Damaging enemies from behind gives the bleed effect a 100% chance to apply
textbox 4: While an enemy bleeds, they leave behind creep that damages other enemies
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
textbox 7: The tear that inflicts the bleed effect also deals double damage

textbox: When used, Sharp Straw will deal damage to all enemies in the room
textbox 2: The damage dealt is equal to Isaac's current tear damage plus 10% of the enemy's max health
textbox 3: Every time this item deals damage, it has a 15% chance to drop 1/2 red hearts
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Sharp Straw is now only able to generate half red hearts (previously, it generated half soul hearts if the player had no heart containers)

textbox: A razor blade orbital that deals contact damage and applies the bleeding status effect to enemies and bosses, which will cause them to take damage every 5 seconds
textbox 2: The contact damage dealt by Mom's Razor is based on how quickly an enemy is moving (faster enemies take more damage)
textbox 3: While an enemy bleeds, they leave behind creep that damages other enemies
textbox 4: This item DOES block enemy shots
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Mom's Chest
textbox 7: Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

textbox: An eye orbital that shoots tears that deal 3.5 damage and deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies
textbox 2: The damage dealt by this orbital does not scale with damage upgrades
textbox 3: Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Bloodshot Eye now blocks enemy shots, has increased shot speed and rate of fire, and now only shoots when lined up with enemies

textbox: When used, spawns a charmed random white delirium version of a boss, that will fight for you and kill other enemies for the rest of the current room
textbox 2: Possible bosses spawned include most bosses in the game
textbox 3: Some bosses' effects can harm Isaac. For example if the spawned boss leaves creep, it can damage Isaac
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium for the first time on any character

textbox: A familiar fly that orbits around a random enemy in the room until that enemy dies, dealing 2 contact damage to other enemies
textbox 2: Angry Fly will move to the next enemy after the one it is currently orbiting dies, until the room is cleared, at which point it will return to orbiting Isaac
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation
r-unlock: Unlock this item by transforming into Beelzebub (Achieved by picking up 3 fly related items, see Transformations page for full list)

textbox: A throwable active item that places a black hole on the ground where it lands, sucking all enemies into it for 6 seconds
textbox 2: Enemies stuck inside the black hole take rapid damage over time
textbox 3: The Black Hole will also suck Isaac into it, but with a much weaker effect than to enemies
textbox 4: The Black Hole will destroy nearby obstacles such as rocks and pots
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase

textbox: +0.1 Damage Up
textbox 2: +1 Soul Heart
textbox 3: Adds a random chance for an enemy in the current room to become charmed or feared briefly
textbox 4: Adds a random chance to spawn a rainbow poop upon taking damage
r-unlock: Unlock this item by breaking 5 rainbow poops
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Electoon

textbox: Causes random enemies to 'lag' at random intervals, causing them to freeze in place for a second
textbox 2: The lag effect can also apply to tears, projectiles and consumables on the ground
textbox 3: While held, this item has a 25% chance to double up any end of room drops (similar to the Contract from Below effect)
textbox 4: Isaac's Luck stat affects how often the lag effect occurs
r-unlock: Complete 7 Daily Challenges (30 on console)
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Freezenification

textbox: A one-time use item that spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance for it to spawn Lump of Coal or The Poop instead
textbox 2: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Mills

textbox: When used, spawns a Sprinkler that rotates in a circle, spraying tears in all directions
textbox 2: Will also synergize with some other items, such as Mom's Eye, Brimstone, Dr. Fetus, Tech X or Loki's Horns
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Kieran and Stewartisme

textbox: +7 Bombs
textbox 2: Allows you to rapidly place bombs on the ground
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Bombs no longer knock each other around when the player has Fast Bombs, allowing for a more controlled line of explosions.
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Lil Horn 20 times

textbox: When picked up, gives Isaac a random familiar which has a random sprite and tear effect
textbox 2: The familiar will be fully randomized again upon entering the next floor
textbox 3: The appearance is chosen from a random co-op baby sprite
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

textbox: A familiar that will transform into another random familiar every 10 seconds, copying their behaviour and effect
textbox 2: Can be any other familiar, including (but not limited to) Lil Brimstone, Bob's Brain, BBF, Meatboy, Rotten Baby
textbox 3: Familiars appear as a white Delirium version of the original
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze
textbox 6: Item Pool: Angel Room, Devil Room

textbox: This item gives you 1 bar of charge on your active item for every 15 enemies you kill
textbox 2: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze
r-unlock: Unlock this item by picking up any 3 of these items in a single run: 9 Volt, The Battery, Car Battery, AAA Battery, Watch Battery
textbox 6: Item Pool: Greed Mode Item Room, Shop

textbox: When used, the coupon causes one random item in the shop to become free
textbox 2: While held, guarantees a random item or pickup from the shop to be half price
textbox 3: The effect of this item also works in Devil Rooms, allowing you to take one random item for free
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Plumbo
textbox 12: Item Pool: Item room, Shop, Beggar

textbox: An active that causes all enemy tears to be held in place and then thrown back away from Isaac for a period of 3 seconds
textbox 2: The aura from this item will repel nearby enemies
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2
textbox 12: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: When used, the box will pick up a maximum of 6 items. Using the box again will put the picked up items back on the floor again, allowing you to move things between rooms
textbox 2: Can move any of the following: Batteries, Items, Trinkets, Hearts, Keys, Bombs, Coins, Chests and more
textbox 3: Using Moving Box with Car Battery will trigger 2 interactions at the same time: First it will drop all items currently inside the box and secondly will then pick up the current room's contents
textbox 4: When used in a room with 2 items you can choose from (e.g. There's Options, Double item room, Boss Rush) the Moving Box will pick only one of the items at random
r-unlock: Unlock this item by using Pandora's Box in the Dark Room floor
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by HurleyFarrill

textbox: Your tears will now be connected together by beams of electricity which deals damage to enemies they hit
textbox 2: The lasers from this item deal 30% of your current damage stat
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Technology Zero's lasers now deal 30% of the player's damage stat per tick (from 100%)
r-unlock: Unlock this item by having 2 technology items at once
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Taking damage will spawn an orbital that rotates around Isaac, dealing contact damage to enemies and blocking enemy projectiles
textbox 2: A maximum of 3 Leprocy orbitals can be active at one time
textbox 3: Using the orbital to deal damage to enemies can cause it to break
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2. Based loosely on the Steam Workshop mod created by Extreme Ninja Home Makeover with changes by Edmund McMillen
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Gives you a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds
textbox 2: Each harbinger behaves differently, based on any of the original 5 horsemen bosses
textbox 3: REPENTANCE - The harbingers will also randomly spawn their relevant Locust variant. The locust fly will do different things for each harbinger - e.g. poison effect for Pestilence
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by by Scayze and Ashkait
textbox 6: Item Pool: Devil Room, Angel Room

textbox: Upon use, this item summons a ghost near Isaac that will follow him around. Also summons a blue crosshair which can be moved around freely. After a few seconds, the crosshair will disappear, and the Ghost will do certain things based on what you targeted:
textbox 2: Items, pickups, trinkets: Brings them to Isaac. Works in shops and devil deals as well, allowing you to take them for no cost. Stealing an item has a chance to fail (a buzzer sound will play if it fails)
textbox 3: Buttons: Presses the button
textbox 4: Enemies: Attacks the enemy until either the ghost or the enemy dies
r-unlock: Unlock this item by opening 20 locked chests
textbox 7: Doors: Opens the door, even if it is locked

textbox: Grants a prism orbital with a large orbital radius
textbox 2: Isaac's tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears
textbox 3: Does not deal contact damage to enemies that it passes over
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by electoon and Erfly

textbox: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other
textbox 2: Issac's tears are no longer limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Scayze and Ashkait

textbox: Upon entering a room, a skull appears over a random enemy's head
textbox 2: Killing the marked enemy will cause the skull to move to a different enemy
textbox 3: If all enemies in the room are cleared in the order they are marked, Isaac gains a random reward from one of the following: Soul heart, Key, Pill, Bomb, Nickel, +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Range, +0.5 Tears, +1 Flat damage or +1 luck
textbox 4: Killing enemies in the wrong order will end the streak and deny you any extra rewards
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Merlo

textbox: With Haemolacria, Isaac's tears become bloody and now fire by in the air in an arc
textbox 2: Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle or enemy, the bloody tear will burst and fire lots of smaller tears at random directions around the impact point
textbox 3: Tears Down - (Tear delay * 2) + 10
textbox 4: Your damage stat is unaffected by this item, however the large bloody tear does +31% of your tear damage and the smaller scattering tears deal 50-80% of your tear damage
r-unlock: Unlock this item by picking up the Blood Clot item 10 times
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Water Balloon) created by HiHowAreYou

textbox: Isaac's tears slow down over time while moving across the room, and upon stopping completely or hitting an object will burst into 8 smaller tears which fire in all directions
textbox 2: This item will also allow you to 'feed' a tear with other tears. Doing so will cause it to increase in size, and also increase their damage and the damage of the burst tears
textbox 3: Once a tear is fed 5 times, it will immediately burst
textbox 4: Tears in the burst will deal half the damage the main tear would have
r-unlock: Unlock this item by taking 10 Tears Up items or pills in the same run
textbox 7: Tears which hit an enemy do not burst

textbox: Isaac's tears are replaced with piercing holy flashes of light, which travel across the room in a similar speed to regular tears
textbox 2: Trisagion tears deal roughly 33% of your usual tear damage, however due to the size of the holy flash it is likely to hit enemies multiple times
textbox 3: Trisagion tears cause no knockback on enemies and simply travel through them (piercing tears)
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Lightshot) created by Wyvern and TRPG
r-unlock: Unlock this item by taking 25 Angel Room items

textbox: Gives you an extra active item slot
textbox 2: Pressing the CTRL key (R2 on PS4, RT on XB1, ZR on Switch) allows you to switch active items
textbox 3: Some items that give temporary effects like The Nail might deactivate if switched to the other slot
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4
r-unlock: Unlock this item by entering every Shop from the first floor up to Mom's Foot (Depths 2) in one run

textbox: +1 Soul Heart
textbox 2: Heals 1 red heart when picked up
textbox 3: Grants you a shield when entering the Boss Room, which prevents damage from 1 hit, then disappears. This shield stacks with Holy Mantle, giving you 2 free hits
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ratlah
r-unlock: Unlock this item by sleeping in 10 different beds

textbox: When used, this item will sacrifice up to 2 of your familiars (chosen at random), and spawn a random Devil Room item for each familar sacrificed this way
textbox 2: In addition to the familiars, any blue flies or spiders will be converted to 1 coin each
textbox 3: If Guardian Angel, Sworn Protector, or Seraphim is sacrificed, Satan will be extra happy and reward you with 2 black hearts
textbox 4: Incubus won't be sacrificed if you're playing as Lilith
textbox 7: If used while you have no familiar, this item will do nothing and won't consume the item
textbox 12: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room

textbox: A familiar with a charged attack, that spawns a line of creep on the floor which damages enemies that walk over it
textbox 2: Spawns 1 random pill when picked up
textbox 3: The familiar and its creep will change randomly when Isaac uses a pill
textbox 4: Possible creep types include green (deals damage), black (slows enemies), red (deals damage, forms a line with a larger puddle), yellow (deals damage, forms a short-range cone) and white (slows enemies, forms a ring)
r-unlock: Unlock this item by dying to your own Ipecac explosion
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
textbox 7: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom

textbox: Spawns 3 random trinkets when picked up
textbox 2: Upon taking damage, you have a random chance to consume one of your currently held trinkets, gaining its effect permanently
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Amethyst
r-unlock: Unlock this item by using 5 Gulp! pills in one run

textbox: A familiar which follows Isaac and, upon taking damage, will spawn a charmed enemy that will fight for you
textbox 2: When the charmed enemy is spawned the egg will crack, but regenerate in the next room
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom
r-unlock: Unlock this item by spawning 3 charmed enemies in a single room

textbox: Flat Stone causes your tears to bounce across the room
textbox 2: Whenever a tear bounces, it deals splash damage to nearby enemies for 25% of your tear damage
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Maddogs
r-unlock: Unlock this item by picking up Rubber Cement 5 times
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +1 Bone Heart
textbox 2: Spawns 3 red hearts on the ground when picked up
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Mom's Heart on hard mode as The Forgotten

textbox: This item gives you an orbital, which will reflect projectiles back at enemies
textbox 2: Unlike some other orbitals, Slipped Rib doesn't deal contact damage to enemies
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating the Isaac boss as The Forgotten
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: A familiar which follows Isaac and spawns a white poop when you take damage
textbox 2: The white poop gives an aura that cuts your tear delay in half (Tears up) and has a chance to block damage
textbox 3: The aura disappears if the poop is destroyed
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush as The Forgotten
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
textbox 7: Counts as 1 of 3 poop items needed towards the Oh Crap transformation.

textbox: A familiar that can be aimed with the fire buttons similar to the Finger item, dealing contact damage to enemies equal to your tear damage
textbox 2: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Satan as The Forgotten
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: When used, this item will spawn a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room
textbox 2: The orbitals and charmed enemies persist when travelling between rooms
textbox 3: Bone orbitals break after dealing enough damage or blocking too many shots
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor as The Forgotten
textbox 7: Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
textbox 12: Item Pool: Item Room, Library, Devil Room

textbox: A passive item that puts a yellow ring around Isaac. Enemies are frozen in place while touching the yellow ring
textbox 2: Enemies touching the ring will stay permanently frozen until you move away, except for bosses which only get a temporary freeze effect after touching it
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Ultra Greedier as The Forgotten

textbox: +1 Bone Heart
textbox 2: +0.7 Tears Up
textbox 3: When you pick this item up, the Mysterious Paper trinket is spawned on the ground
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Boss Rush as The Forgotten

textbox: A familiar that flies across the room every few seconds while firing and damages enemies (2x your tear damage)
textbox 2: Can also be used like the Boomerang to pick up consumables on the ground
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating ??? in The Chest floor as The Forgotten
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode item Room

textbox: When picked up, this item replaces all of your red heart containers with 6 Bone Hearts
textbox 2: Every time you lose a bone heart, lots of bones fire in all directions damaging any enemies hit and you gain a permanent +0.5 Tears Up
textbox 3: For the Lost and Keeper characters, this item simply gives a permanent Tears Up
textbox 4: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
r-unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in the Dark Room floor as The Forgotten
textbox 6: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Obtained by beating the Basement 1 boss within 1 minute, then bombing the large shadow that appears in the middle of the starting room
textbox 2: While held, Mom's Foot will stomp on you from above twice every few seconds, and she will continue to stomp for as long as you hold this item
textbox 3: Using the Broken Shovel will stop Mom stomping you for the rest of the current room (or current wave if you're in the boss rush or challenge room)
textbox 4: Beating the Boss Rush while holding this item will drop the second half of the Broken Shovel, which combine to create Mom's Shovel, which is used to unlock The Forgotten character
textbox 7: Dropping the Broken Shovel will cause it to disappear if you leave the room

textbox: Drops after beating the Boss Rush while holding the other half of the Broken Shovel (see previous item for more details)
textbox 2: Combines with the first Broken Shovel piece to create Mom's Shovel (see next item for more details)
textbox 3: Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5 and used in the quest to unlock The Forgotten character

textbox: When used, spawns a trapdoor that leads to the next floor
textbox 2: Digging in certain spots with objects or markings on the floor will guarantee a crawlspace once per floor
textbox 3: Unlocks The Forgotten character when used on a mound of dirt that appears in a room in The Dark Room floor
textbox 4: Obtained by combining the two Broken Shovel pieces. The first piece drops by beating the first floor boss within 1 minute then bombing the shadow in the first room. The second piece drops after beating the Boss Rush as long as you are holding the first Broken Shovel piece (see previous 2 items for full details)
textbox 7: After The Forgotten is unlocked, using it on the mound of dirt again just spawns a random type of chest
